attributes.action: Demand a National Referendum on Net Zero Policies and Climate Mandates
attributes.additional_details:
We, the people, demand that the UK Government hold a binding national referendum on the sweeping net-zero policies currently being imposed on the British public.- We believe in environmental responsibility—but not at the cost of democracy, affordability, and freedom.
These policies—rushed through without proper democratic consultation—are affecting our daily lives:
- Escalating energy bills driven by unreliable renewables and carbon levies
attributes.background:
The UK is undergoing a radical transformation under the net-zero agenda.
- These changes affect every household, business, and community.
- Yet they’ve been imposed without a vote, without debate, and consent.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733338
